card.name: Imrahil
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Imrahil. Leader. +3 direct influence against dúnadan characters with a home site in Lamedon or Belfalas. +2 direct influence against Knights of Dol Amroth. When Imrahil is at Dol Amroth his controlling player may keep one more card than normal in his hand; or he can tap during the site phase to take Tower of Amroth. If during opponent’s organization phase, an opponent has a company without an agent at a non-haven site in Belfalas, you may look at his hand.

card.name: Angbor
card.text: Unique. +2 direct influence against Men and Dúnadain factions playable at sites in Gondor. Home Site: Calembel

card.name: Arathorn II
card.text: Unique. +1 direct influence against elves and dúnedain. +2 direct influence against Rangers of the North faction. -2 marshalling points if eliminated. Home Sites: Annúminas, Rivendell

card.name: Araudagul
card.text: Unique. Half-troll. Leader. +1 direct influence against orcs. +1 direct influence against Orcs of the Ered Harmal faction. Discard on a body check of 9.

card.name: Carlon
card.text: Unique. +1 direct influence against men. +2 direct influence against any faction playable at Bozisha-Dar.

card.name: Elindiel
card.text: Unique. She may not be one of the starting characters. +2 direct influence against non-elf characters with a home site in Eriador. One undead hazard creature may be played (not counting against the hazard limit) against any company containing Elindiel. Discard Elindiel if an elf character with a higher mind is in her company. Home Site: Any site in Arthedain

card.name: Eotháin
card.text: Unique. Home Site: Dunharrow

card.name: Feagwath
card.text: Unique. Leader. Can use Shadow-magic. +2 direct influence against orcs or undead, May tap to cancel any one non-Unique attack against his company. Home Site: Barad-dûr, Thuringwathost

card.name: Galion
card.text: Unique. Tap Galion to cancel attack against his company keyed to Woodland Realm.

card.name: Golasgil
card.text: Unique. +2 direct influence against the Men of Anfalas faction. Home Site: Lond Galen

card.name: Halbarad of the North
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Halbarad. +1 direct influence against factions playable at his home sites.

card.name: Heladil
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess against spiders. +1 direct influence against the Wood-elves faction.

card.name: Hirluin the Fair
card.text: Unique. +1 direct influence against dunedain. Home site: Serelond

card.name: Ingold
card.text: Unique. -1 to corruption checks. -1 to influence attempts against factions. Home Site: Minas Tirith

card.name: Khandash
card.text: Unique. May also be played as a hero character. +1 direct influence against the Haradrim faction.

card.name: Khursh
card.text: Unique. May also be played as a hero character. +1 direct influence against the Chyans faction.

card.name: Leärdinoth
card.text: Unique. Can use Spirit-magic. + 1 direct influence against factions and characters playable at his home sites.

card.name: Miruimor
card.text: Unique. Can use Sorcery. +2 direct influence against men and orcs. May be in a company with orc or undead characters. Home Site: Umbar, Barad-dûr, Thuringwathost

card.name: Ranger
card.text: May not be a starting character. Home Site: Any non shadow-hold site in Arthedain or Rhudaur

attr.value: Any non shadow-hold site in Arthedain or Rhudaur

card.name: Sakalure
card.text: Unique. Can use spirit-magic.

card.name: Theodred
card.text: Unique. +2 direct influence against the Riders of Rohan. +1 direct influence against any character that has Edoras as a home site. Home Site: Edoras

card.name: Ulrac
card.text: Unique. +2 direct influence against characters and factions playable at Wain Easterling Camp

card.name: Assassin
card.text: Men. Three attacks (of one strike each) all against the same character. Attacker chooses defending character. One or two of these attacks may be canceled by tapping one character (not the defending character) in the defender's company for each attack canceled.

card.name: Death of a Kinsman
card.text: Unique. Playable after an attack if a character has been killed. Tap all other characters in the company.

card.name: Heritage Forsaken
card.text: Playable on a dúnadan character who is not moving through a Coastal Sea. Gives -2 character marshalling points while in play. During its movement/hazard phase, the character may tap to remove it. Make a roll, adding 3 to the roll if the character taps and 3 for each Coastal Sea in the company’s side path: if the result is grater than 12, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated in a given company.

card.name: King of the Dead
card.text: Unique. Undead. One strike. Playable keyed to Dunland, Enedhwaith, Gap of Isen, or Old Pûkel-land, or at Ruins and Lairs sites in these regions; also playable at Dunharrow or Vale of Erech. After the attack, each character wounded by King of the Dead makes a corruption check at -1.

card.name: Rangers at Sarn Ford
card.text: Dwarves. 3 strikes (detainment against hero companies). May be played keyed to Numeriador, Forochel, Angmar, Gundabad, Grey Mountain Narrows, Withered Heath, Northern Rhovanion, Iron Hills, High Pass, or Redhorn Gate, or to non-Dark-hold, non-Shadow-hold sites in these regions, may also be played keyed to any Dwarf-hold. If Gates of Morning is in play, may be keyed to any site in the above regions, and at any Under-deeps site whose surface site is in the above regions. If Doors of Night is in play, this becomes a normal attack against hero companies, unless it contains a dwarf.

card.name: The Black Captain
card.text: Unique. Playable if the Witch-king of Angmar and Doors of Night is in play. All Nazgûl may be keyed to Imlad Morgul, Ithilien and Anorien and to sites in those regions (except Henneth Annûn). Witch-king of Angmar may attack from his permanent-event state, counting as one against the hazard limit. If he is not defeated after such an attack, he is returned to his player's hand, not discarded. All Nazgûl attacks keyed to the above regions or sites receive +2 prowess. Discard this card if the Witch-king of Angmar is discarded or eliminated, if Doors of Night leaves play, or at the end of any turn if the Witch-king of Angmar is not in active play.

card.name: Under His Dominion
card.text: Playable on a character taken prisoner at a Dark-hold. Make a roll and subtract the character's mind: if the result plus the character's corruption points is greater than 6, the character becomes a minion agent controlled by the hazard player until this card is discarded (it cannot be targeted by Marvels Told). Discard all other hazard permanent-events on the character. Cannot be duplicated on a given character. Discard if the character is eliminated. During the organization phase, a sage at the same site as the character (other than the character) may tap to attempt to remove this card. Make a roll; add 1 for each additional sage or diplomat in the company that taps in support: if the result plus the character's mind is greater than 7, discard this card; the character joins the sage's company and is controlled by the sage's controlling player.

card.name: Aglarond
card.text: Playable during the site phase at Glittering Caves if you have a Dwarf with a mind of 5 or greater. The Company faces an attack (cannot be canceled): (Pûkel-creature - 2 strikes with 8 prowess). Tap a Dwarf after the attack or discard this card. This site becomes a Border-hold [B] and a Dwarf-hold and loses all automatic attack. This site is never discarded and never untaps for you. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Almost felt you liked the Forest!
card.graphics: Almost felt you liked the Forest.jpg
card.text: Playable on an Awakened Plants attack, the attack is cancelled. Alternatively playable on an ent ally, the ally may face strikes from automatic-attacks or attacks keyed to his company’s non-darkhold site (until the end of the turn).

card.name: Avari
card.text: Playable at any Elf-hold outsite of Eriador, Gondor, Mordor and/or Wilderland if the influence check is greater than 11. Standard Modifications: Men (-2), Dwarves (-2), Elves (+2).

card.name: Banner of Elendil's House
card.text: Unique. Playable at Rivendell if you have Arwen and Ring of Barahir in play. May only be borne by a dunadan. Each dunadan in bearer’s company requires one less influence to control (to a minimum of one). Cannot be played by a Fallen-wizard player.

card.name: Beechbone
card.text: Unique. Ent. Playable at any non-haven site in Fangorn. If Beechbone is wounded all other ent allies in his company receive +3 prowess and may be attacked by automatic-attacks and hazards creatures attacks keyed to sites. Discard Beechbone if his company moves to a site not in: Fangorn, Gap of Isen, Wold & Foothills, Enedhwaith, or Redhorn Gate.

card.name: Charge!
card.text: Playable on a moving company facing an attack if all characters in the company control a horse ally (one Hobbit must not control a horse ally if Shadowfax is in the company) and no other allies are in the company. You assign all strikes off the attack. The attack’s prowess is modified by -1 for every 3 characters that do not get to receive a strike, the attack’s body is modified by -1 for every 5 characters that do not get to receive a strike. Also playable (for such a company), if you attack another company at a Ruins & Lairs. All your characters receives + 2 prowess.

card.name: Cause of the Free Peoples
card.text: Unique. Playable on a Diplomat character at the same site as a revealed Agent who cannot use any type of magic. Tap the character and make an influence check against the Agent modified by -1 for all revealed Agents in play. If the influence check is successful, the Agent is discarded. Additionally, if the player making the check has a copy of that Agent in his hand, it may be played as an Ally worth 1 less marshalling point (to a minimum of 1) under the control of the influencing character.

card.name: Entwives
card.text: Unique. Playable at any non-haven site in a Wilderness, which is neither adjacent to a Shadow-land nor a Dark-domain and is outside of Eriador, Gondor or Mordor if the influence check is greater than 12. Standard Modifications: Ents of Fangorn (+2), Wizards (-5), for each Ent ally in the company (+2). You may reveal Ent-wives to your opponent during you movement/hazard phase. If you do so, any Ent allies moving to a site where Ent-wives are playable may not be discarded as a result of this movement. This faction is worth 3 marshalling points if you also control a man faction playable at a site in same region as the site where you brought Ent-wives into play.

card.name: Evermind
card.text: Playable on an eliminated character that has Edoras as a home site. Place the character in your marshalling point pile with this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Fool of a Took
card.text: Unique. Playable on Pippin if he is the bearer of a Palantír. He may tap to use a Palantír he bears. Discard this card if Pippin no longer bears a Palantír.

card.name: Garrison of Cair Andros
card.text: Unique. Playable at Cair Andros if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard modifications: Dúnedain (+1).

card.name: Golden Hall of Edoras
card.text: Playable on Edoras if you have a character whose home site is Edoras in the company. Any character that has Edoras as a home site may tap at this site during your organization phase to search and shuffle into you deck Shadowfax, Noble Steed, Wild Horses or Horses from your discard pile or sideboard. Character makes a corruption check. Discard this card if the site is discarded or returned to its location deck, or when any play deck is exhausted.

card.name: Great Elf-warrior
card.text: Unique. Playable on Sam if he bears Sting, Phial of Galadriel, or The One Ring and if he defeats a strike from an Orc or Spider attack. He receives +3 prowess against Orcs and Spiders.

card.name: Hew the Stone
card.text: Unique. Playable during the site phase at Isengard if you have at least 2 allies and/or factions playable at Wellinghall in play and you are not Saruman or a Fallen-wizard player. The company faces two attacks (Orcs - 4 strikes with 7 prowess, Men - 3 strikes with 8 prowess). If no characters are untapped after the attack, discard this card. Otherwise, you may tap one character and put this card in your marshalling point pile. If your opponent has more than one stage card in play, he must discard one stage card of his choice (your choice, if your opponent is Saruman). This card can be played regardless of The Fortress of Isen card text.

card.name: Hobbits must make Haste
card.text: Playable at the end of the movement/hazard phase on a moving company that contains only hobbits and at least one untapped ally. Tap the ally, the company may move to an additional site this turn.

card.name: Horn of Eorl
card.text: Unique. Merry only. Playable at a tapped or untapped Edoras. Merry may tap Horn of Eorl to give +3 to an influence check against a faction he is trying to influence.

card.name: Horse-manes' Helm
card.text: Unique. Helmet.+1 body (to a maximum of 9). Tap this item to shuffle a ´Warrior only´ resource event, which was used by the bearer of Horse-manes's Helm, into your play deck instead of discarding it.

card.name: Kingsfoil
card.text: Playable only on Aragorn if he holds Athelas and only if Ioreth is in the same company. Tap Aragorn. Discard Athelas. Remove all corruption cards off wounded characters in the same company and change all wounded characters in the company from wounded to untapped. Return of the King may be played from your hand or sideboard if Aragorn is in Minas Tirith.

card.name: Mearas
card.text: Unique. Playable at Edoras or Dunharrow if the influence check is greater than 12. Standard Modifications: Men with home sites listed above (+2), Wild Horses (+1), if Shadowfax is in the influencing character's company (+3).

card.name: Mighty Steed
card.text: Horse. Playable at any tapped or untapped Border-hold. Cannot be controlled by a Dwarf or Hobbit. If each character in a company has a Mighty Steed, Noble Steed or Shadowfax the company may move up to two additional non-coastal sea regions per turn.

card.name: Putting away all Fear
card.text: Unique. Playable on a company with a Dark-domain in its site path, or at a site in a Dark-domain. Discard all corruption cards placed on characters in this company. Make a roll for each environment hazard permanent-event or long-event in play; discard each on a roll greater than 8. This card and its effects cannot be canceled.

card.name: Raid on Umbar
card.text: Unique. Playable if you have at least two factions in play at sites in Gondor. If you have dúnadan warrior bearing a Stolen Knowledge at Umbar, tap this card. If this card is tapped during company’s site phase at Umbar, it faces two attacks (Men - 3 strikes with 7 prowess; Men - 2 strikes with 8 prowess). Afterwards tap a character to place Raid on Umbar into your marshalling point pile, otherwise, discard it. Factions in play at Umbar give one less marshalling point (to a minimum of one). and Pirates and Umbarean Corsairs receive -2 prowess. Discard Raid on Umbar if opponent has ever more factions in play at sites in Hyrmenfalas and its adjacent regions than you have at sites in Gondor.

card.name: Rast Vorn
card.text: Playable on The Worthy Hills if Woses of Eryn Vorn is in play. Tap a ranger character during your end-of-turn phase to take Athelas, Healing Herbs or Drughu from your discard pile into your hand. Discard this card if the site is discarded or returned to its location deck, or when any play deck is exhausted.

card.name: Ring of Barahir
card.text: Unique. Playable by Elrond, Arwen or any manifestation of Aragorn II at Rivendell. When you play this item, you may take Choice of Lúthien from your sideboard or discard pile and shuffle it into your play deck. Tap Ring of Barahir to cancel a dragon or drake creature attack and to put the creature's card back into its player's hand. Cannot be stored or stolen.

card.name: Rose Cotton
card.text: Hobbits. Playable by a hobbit at the Green Dragon Inn or at Bywater (even if the site is tapped). Tap Rose Cotton to prevent any effect that would either discard her controlling character or that would return him to your hand. If controlled by Sam Gamgee, Rose Cotton is worh 2 marshalling points, and you may tap her to search your playdeck or discard pile for any card that mentions Sam Gamgee in its card text. Discard Rose Cotton if her company leaves the Shire.

card.name: Royal Navy
card.text: Unique. Playable at Pelargir if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard modifications: Dúnadan +1, Steward of Gondor +2, Aragorn II, if Return of the King is on him +3. Once a turn you may tap this faction to allow on of your companies to move an additional coastal region; or to cancel an attack by Corsairs of Umbar against one of your companies.

card.name: The Ring goes to Gondor
card.text: Unique. Playable if The One Ring and The Steward of Gondor are in play, if The One Ring is born by any manifestation of Boromir II, Denethor II, Faramir or Aragorn II if at a site in Gondor. Prevents the play of Return of the King, unless The One Ring is born by a manifestation of Aragorn II. All man or dúnedain attacks against minion companies in Gondor receive +1 prowess and +1 strike. Every site in Gondor at which a man or dúnedain hero faction is in play becomes a free-hold and every region in Gondor which contains such a site becomes a free-domain. Discard this card if the conditions to play this card are not meet.

card.name: This We Will Take
card.text: Playable by one of your character during CvCC, if you have you have a non-ring item in hand, which a character in opponent’s company bears. Each character makes a roll modified by +2 if character is an avatar and add the number of characters in each company. If your result exceeds your opponent’s, you may immidiately play the item; opponent must discard his version.

card.name: Tower of Ecthelion
card.text: Unique, Playable on Minas Tirith if you have Return of the King or Steward of Gondor in play. When Minas Tirith becomes tapped, tap Tower of Ecthelion instead. To untap Tower of Ecthelion, tap a character with mind 6 or higher at Minas Tirith. The character makes a corruption check. You receive this card’s marshalling points if you have Tower Guard of Minas Tirith and The White Tree in play. Discard this card if Minas Tirith is discarded or if Smoke on the Wind is played on Minas Tirith.

card.name: Wandlimb
card.text: Unique. Ent. Playable at any tapped or untapped site where you have the Entwifes in play, if Treebeard is at the site.Tap to cancel the effects of one hazard environment that targets her company’s current site or region. May not be attacked by automatic-attacks or hazards keyed to her site. Discard Wandlimb if her company does not contain Treebeard.

card.name: When a Man loves a Woman
card.graphics: When a Man loves a Woman.jpg
card.text: Playable on a company containing either: Galadriel and Celeborn, Arwen and Aragorn II, or Eowyn and Faramir. Each of them gains +2 direct influence useable only against the other. If they are in the same company, all influence attempts against them fail. +1 to each of their corruption checks. If one of them leaves play, but is not placed Out of Play, you may wound the other at any time (no body check required) to return the missing one to your hand (reshuffle your play deck if it was searched).

card.name: Brought back Alive
card.text: Saruman specific. Playable during the organization phase on an overt company if your opponent is a non-minion. There is no limit of how many orcs the company may contain. All successful strikes against your opponent's characters do not wound. Instead, they and all non-follower cards they control are placed 'off to the side' under this card. When target company is at Isengard it may place all cards worth marshalling points placed under this card in his marshalling point pile giving one marshalling point for each such card stored. For each character placed under this card the hazard limit against the company is increased by one. If two or more characters in the company are removed from the company for any reason or if a character in the company is wounded in company versus company combat, the characters placed under this card build a new company at their current site.

card.name: Tower of Amroth
card.text: Unique. Imrahil specific. Playable on Dol Amroth. The site becomes a protected Lord-haven. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled. Characters with Dol Amroth as their home site may be brought into play under general influence at this site even if Imrahil is in play and not here. This card may be played with a starting company in lieu of a minor item. When with Dol Amroth would normally tap, tap this card instead. Discard this card during the site phase when no company is at with Dol Amroth.

card.name: Azog's Scimtar
card.text: Unique. Hoard Item. Weapon. Warrior only: +2 prowess (+4 against Dwarves if held by an Orc leader) to a maximum on 9 (11 against Dwarves). If held by an Orc leader, +2 direct influence against Orcs and Orc factions, 3 marshalling points and 3 corruption points.

card.name: Breeder's Stock
card.text: Command. You must have Warlord in play to play this card. Tap this card to make a roll. If roll minus your stage points greater than 7, discard this card, else, take a non-unique troll/orc minion from your discard pile into your hand. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Call to Arms
card.text: Command. You must have Warlord in play to play this card. Tap this card to make a roll. If roll minus your stage points is greater than 7, discard this card, else, put a faction playable at your Warlord’s current site into your hand from your discard pile. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Cave-trolls
card.text: Unique. Playable at Creb Durga if the influence check is greater than 9.Once in play, the number required to influence this faction is zero. If this influence attempt is made by an Orc or Troll leader, you may place this faction under the control of that leader and not tap the site. Discard the faction if the leader moves or leaves play. Three or more factions controlled by the same leader give two extra marshalling points. Standard Modifications: Stone Trolls (-2).

card.name: Cult of the Dark Lord
card.text: Unique. Playable on Umbar if you have an unique faction in play at this site, and if you place a character (must be at the site) in your out-of-play pile. Umbar becomes a haven for your covert companies. All automatic-attacks become normal attacks against all of the other players’ companies. Once a turn you may tap Cult of the Dark Lord to search your discard pile for a man or dúnadan character or a man or dúnadan creature (without an asterix) to shuffle it into your play deck. Discard this card when Umbar leaves active play or if you do not have a unique faction in play at Umbar.

card.name: Elfhewer
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable at Goblin-gate by a leader, if you control the Goblins of Goblin-gate. May also be played if the site is tapped. Values in parentheses and brackets apply to an Orc bearer. Warrior only: +2 prowess to a maximum of 9 (+3 against Elves to a maximum of 10 and -1 to strike's body).

card.name: Eyes of the Tower
card.text: Sauron or ringwraith specific. Playable if you have a palantir in activeplay. If this card is untapped you can rotate this card by 90°, if you discard Messenger from Mordor from your hand (for no effect); you may then name one or two, if opponent also has a palantir in active play, resource item(s) and if the items are in opponent’s hand he must immidiatly discard them. Alternatively you may choose one of opponent’s stored non-special items instead. If you have any a manifastation of the item in your hand you may choose to make an influence attempt against this item (without the bonus for revealing the item though). Both players must choose a bearer of a palantir to be participating in the influence attempt. This card does not untap but rotates by 90° during each of your untap phases, until it is inverted completely. Discard this card if you do not have a palantir in active play. Cannot be duplicated on a given player.

card.name: Foundations Remain
card.text: Unique. Necromancer specific. Tap this card when you discard a Records Unread or Secret Book (for no effect) at a site where information is playabale. Once this card is tapped, you mayn invert in by 90° everytime you play (for no effect) Hold Rebuilt and Repaired during the site phase at Barad-dûr. Once this card is inverted by 360° place it your marshalling point pile (you now receive it marshalling points). Barad-dûr is now restored and you may use the Barad-dûr site card normally; you may replace the Necromancer card with either the Lidless Eye or Sauron (directly from sideboard), if your opponent is not a ringwraith. This card may be played with a starting company in lieu of a minor item.

card.name: Guldurim
card.text: Unique. Playable at Dol Guldur if the influence check is greater than 9. Influence as 0 once in play. Standard Modifications: Necromancer's Body Guard(+2), Orcs of Dol Guldur (-2)

card.name: House of Lamentations
card.text: Playable on a non-Under-deeps Dark-hold. Site becomes a Darkhaven for the purposes of healing. Discard Houses of Lamentations when the site is returned to the location deck or discarded. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Legions of the Dark Lord
card.text: As a permanent-event you may play this card into your marshalling point pile, you receive this card’s marshalling points when you have 5 or more man, dúnadan and/or orc factions in play at sites in Mordor or its adjacent regions. Cannot be duplicated as a permanent-event. As short-event if you have at least a man, a dúnadan and an orc faction in play at a site in Mordor or its adjacent regions. Removes all non-dragon factions from his discard pile and shuffles them into his play deck.

card.name: Lord of the World
card.text: Playable if you a have either more factions, more characters, more allies, more items or more miscellaneous point cards in play than your opponent(s). This card comes into play tapped. Rotate it any time (by 90°) if you have more factions, or characters, or allies, or items or miscellaneous point cards than your opponent(s), but not for the category you choose for bringing the card into play, nor for one you choose before to rotate the card. Discard this card if your opponent(s) has ever more marshalling points in all categories. If the card is fully rotated you receive the card’s marshalling points. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Marauding Band of Orcs
card.text: Playable on an orc leader. Discard if leader leaves play or if at any time the company contains more than one non-orc character. There is no maximum to the number of characters in this company. One and two minded orcs in the company require no influence to control. There is no limit to the number of characters that may be played with this company on a given turn. Attacks against this company may not be cancelled.

card.name: Master Smith
card.text: Sauron specific. Playable on a elf sage with a mind greater then 5 during the organization phase at a Darkhaven. The character becomes a leader (if not already), receives +3 direct influence against characters. Once during your organization phase, you may tap the elf to bring up to 3 resources and/or characters from your sideboard into your discard pile. Discard this card if there is character with a higher mind in his company. You may start the game with this card in lieu of playing a minor item. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Oliphant
card.text: Animal. Playable at any Border-hold in the Sun-lands or the Uttersouth at which you have a man faction in play. (May also be played if the site is tapped). Discard if bearer’s company moves through more then three regions or uses movement other then region movement. -2 body to any strike (or character in CvCC) that Oliphant taps to face.

card.name: Terror of Cardolan
card.text: Unique. Aradagor specific. Only playable if Aradagor is a War-Lord. Your companies with a company size of 2 or less or with Aradagor may play allies at tapped sites. This card can be played in the starting company in lieu of a character. +1 corruption checks for followers of Aradagor. Aradagor cannot be discarded from the result of a body check. +2 direct against trolls.

card.name: The Lord of the Rings
card.text: Unique. This card must be revealed at the start of the game. You may not reveal any non-Sauron minion avatar. All your ring test receive +2 to their roll. All your companies bearing gold ring items or ring special items are considered overt. You may include up to nine copies of Ring for Mortal Men in your deck and sideboard combined, and play them after any ring test result of 8 or 9. If you store a Ring for Mortal Men, you may play a Ringwraith from your sideboard under your general influence for one point of influence to control. If you have The One Ring the hazard limit against all your companies is increased by one to a minimum of three. If The One Ring is stored at Barad-dûr, you may place all your stored Ring for Mortal Men on Ringwraith characters. You win if you have The One Ring and if you receive the points from Lord of the World.

card.name: The Mornarturi
card.text: Playable if you are Sauron, Akhôrahil, Adûnaphel, or the Witch-king if you have a Dúnadan faction in play. Your Dúnadan characters may form companies with orcs, trolls, undead and Ringwraith characters. These Dúnadan characters must always be the highest mind character in the company, and the company may not include a leader besides the character.

card.name: The Necromancer
card.text: Manifestation of the Lidless Eye. Playable if your opponent is not a ringwraith and you have not revealed a ringwraith. You are Sauron, not a Ringwraith. You may not reveal a Ringwraith or play Ringwraith or Balrog followers. +3 to your general influence. Creates an additional automatic attack at Dol Guldur against all other non-ringwraith player's companies: Maia: 1 strike with 21 prowess (cannot be cancelled). You may not use the site card for Barad-dûr. All cards which must be stored at Barad-dûr must be stored at Dol Guldur instead. You may play agent character as normal minion characters and all your agent characters require 1 less mind to control to a minimum of 4 mind. All your overt companies have their hazard limit increased by 1 to a minimum of 3. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: The Necromancer's Bodyguard
card.text: Unique. Playable at Dol Guldur if the influence check is greater than 9. Influence as 0 once in play. Standard Modifications: Guldurim(+2), Black Trolls (-2)

card.name: Their Horror spreads before them
card.text: Playable if your Ringwraith’s company has defeated an elf, man, dwarf or dúnadan creature attack. All further attacks of the same type as the defeated creature against this company have their prowess reduced by -1. Cannot be duplicated for a given creature type.

card.name: Warlord
card.text: Playable on a character with a starting mind 7 or greater and if he has By the Ringwraith’s Word on him besides the Mouth. The minion becomes a Warlord. Tap this card during your organization phase to put one card from your sideboard into your play deck or 3 cards from your sideboard to the discard pile. Does not need GI to be controlled. Cannot be controlled by any character. This card can be played in the starting company in lieu of a starting item. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

attr.value: Tap a hobbit during the site phase to make minor items playable at this site this turn.
(1st) Hobbits --- 3 strikes with 5 prowess; (2nd) Dúnedain --- 2 strikes with 10 prowess.
Undead --- 4 strikes with 7 prowess; each character wounded must make an corruption check.

Sapling of the White Tree may be stored her for two marshalling points if Rebuild the Town has been played on this site. The White Tree is playable using a Sapling of the White Tree here: in The White Tree description replace all occurrences of “Minas Tirith” with Annúminas”.
Undead --- 4 strikes with 7 prowess; each character wounded must make an corruption check.
On non-unique Dúnadan hazard creature may be played (not counting against the hazard limit) against a minion company moving to this site regardless off other cards played.
The Hobbits faction is playable at this site

The Hobbits faction is playable at this site; each hobbit at this site, bearing a battle-gear item gives +1 to the influence check . When the Hobbits faction is in play at this site, any hobbit, with a home site in the Shire may be brought into play at Bywater.
(1st) Hobbits --- 6 strikes with 5 prowess; (2nd) Dúnedain --- 2 strikes with 11 prowess
If the Hobbit faction is in play at this site, then the (1st) auto-matic attack receives + 1 prowess and +1 strikes and cannot be canceled.
(1st) Orcs --- 2 strikes with 6 prowess (2nd) Trolls --- 2 strikes with 10 prowess
(1st) Orcs --- 2 strikes with 6 prowess (detainment against overt companies) (2nd) Trolls --- 2 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against overt companies)
Any non-unique Orc or Troll character may be brought into play at this site.
Undead --- 3 strikes with 9 prowess, each character wounded must make a corruption check.
Any non-unique Undead creature may be played at this site.
Undead --- 3 strikes with 9 prowess, each character wounded must make a corruption check.
Any non-unique Undead creature may be played at this site.
Items (minor, major*) *---Sapling of the White Tree only---
Undead --- 3 strikes with 8 prowess; any character wounded by a strike must make a second body check modified by +2 immediately following the first body check.

This site card may only be revealed if either Gates of Morning or Doors of Night is in play, and if the company discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. Any hazard creatures normally keyed to coastal sea may be played at this site.
Undead --- 3 strikes with 8 prowess; any character wounded by a strike must make a second body check modified by +2 immediately following the first body check.

This site card may only be revealed if either Gates of Morning or Doors of Night is in play, and if the company discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. Any hazard creatures normally keyed to coastal sea may be played at this site.
(1st) Orcs --- 4 strikes with 6 prowess; (2nd) See Special
Up to 3 Wolf-riders (as creatures) are playable at this site, simultaneously, as a second automatic-attack. Add together the strikes from all Wolf-riders played, and consider them a single attack.
Orcs --- 4 strikes with 6 prowess (detainment agaisnt overt companies)
Creb Durga (0), The Gem-deeps (7), The Under-gates (6), The Under-vaults (9)
(1st) Trolls --- 2 strikes with 10 prowess (2nd) Troll --- 1 strike with 13 prowess
If Doors of Night is in play, creatures normally keyed to dark-hold {D} may be played at this site,
Creb Durga (0), The Gem-deeps (7), The Under-gates (6), The Under-vaults (9)
Trolls --- 2 strikes with 10 prowess (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to a Ruins and Lairs
Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment. Any non-unique ally playable at any under-deeps site may be played here.

Ranger of the North faction is playable at this site. Tap a dúnadan ranger to make information playable at this site this turn. Tap one non-ranger man or dúnadan at this site to give that character ranger skill for the rest of the game. Place this card (or some other token) with the character when he leaves this site.
Tap a dúnadan ranger to make information playable at this site this turn.
Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-hold {S}.
During the site phase acompany may discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card the company controls to make Palantír of Osgiliath playable until the end of turn.
Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Border-hold {B}.
During the site phase a company may discard (for no effect) a Stolen Knowledge card the company controls to make Palantír of Osgiliath playable at this site until the end of turn.
If a hero factions is in play at Umbar, all versions of the site become Free-holds. Additionally all automatic-attacks become non-detainment against minion companies.
Men --- 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if no elves are in the company)

Umbarean Corsairs faction is playable at Umbar. If a minion faction is in play at Umbar, all versions of the site become a Shadow-hold {S}. Additionally all automatic-attacks become non-detainment against hero companies.
Men --- each character faces 1 strike with 8 prowess (detainment against covert company)
